name: Escape the Room (itch) (TheAmbientBeard)
description:
Pick up objects, rummage through cabinets, and look under furniture as you search for the keys to escape the room before time runs out in this PC VR horror game!

This is a fun little Halloween game  I made for trunk or treat events and the like during the spooky holiday. Mainly for teenagers and older, the game can be a little creepy.

Your triggers are your main controls. Your right hand is your flashlight and used for teleporting around the room, while your left is used to grab on to objects and pick up keys.

Note the game will try and height adjust for the most optimal experience. Please be sure to have your floor set correctly and to be standing tall to have the best experience.

Let me know what you think and if there are any bugs or suggestions.
